Name: Christa
Text: Wait.. Is that.. a WASP sentry drone? What's something like that doing here?

Name: Christa
Text: This must be what that weird robot meant by 'Contigency Plan'

Name: Christa
Text: Oh well. It's nothing I can't handle. This model is obsolete anyways.

Name: Christa
Text: If they really wanted to kill me, they should have sent the new HORNET prototypes.
